pullrequest.title: Learn Gazebo Visual Plugins for Ocean Reflections

content.raw:
In 1552:4cd6976b914b, I use code very similar to the Fresnel example. I believe the effects are abit too strong, and some of the images look too distorted.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2040643218-image.png)
‌

In 1553:286e6763abdc, I remove the Fresnel and noise effects

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3500795833-image.png)
I will try to find a middle ground and then see if I can add the waves back in.
content.html:
In 1552:4cd6976b914b, I use code very similar to the Fresnel example. I believe the effects are abit too strong, and some of the images look too distorted.

‌

In 1553:286e6763abdc, I remove the Fresnel and noise effects

I will try to find a middle ground and then see if I can add the waves back in.
